name: Run or Die
description:
Attention 🚨: Don't be fooled by the trailer, anyone can play this game, no knowledge of BunnyHOP, Surf, or anything like that is needed to play this experience.


Embark on an exhilarating adventure in a groundbreaking 3D platformer where creativity and challenge blend seamlessly. Navigate through multiple imaginative worlds, filled with distinctive obstacles, traps, and features.

  • BunnyHOP Mechanic: Master the unique BunnyHOP ability to leap over barriers and perform extended jumps. Timing and precision are key.
  • Obstacle Jumping: Traverse intricate levels by jumping over, under, and around obstacles. Feel the real tension of leap-and-land mechanics.
  • Long Jumps: Perform long jumps to clear large gaps. Calculate your power and angle to land safely on distant platforms.
  • Traps and Challenges: Beware of cleverly designed traps scattered throughout the worlds. Quick thinking and fast reflexes are needed to overcome hazards.
  • Climbing Mechanic: Scale walls and cliffs in select maps to reach new heights and unlock hidden areas.
  • Engaging Objectives: Overcome obstacles and reach the end of each world. Strategy, persistence, and skill are necessary to progress through complex levels.

Whether a casual gamer or a hardcore platforming enthusiast, enjoy hours of thrilling gameplay. Uncover secrets, avoid traps, and leap your way to victory. Every jump is a leap into a new adventure!
